extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Sadar privasi, aman Adblock pikeun YouTube™. Ngablokir Iklan dina YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Adblock pikeun Youtube™ disimpen kira-kira. $savedTime$ hirup anjeun.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayVideoBranding.message: Tampilkeun inpormasi ekstensi di handap pidéo

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Témbongkeun pamundut diblokir diitung dina badge
